columns.document_code: The unique identifier for each document.
columns.document_structure_code: The identifier linking the document to its structure.
columns.document_type_code: The classification type of the document.
columns.access_count: The number of times the document has been accessed.
columns.document_name: The title or name of the document.

Documents.table_description: The table manages documents and their associated attributes.

columns.role_code: The unique identifier for each role.
columns.role_description: The detailed explanation of the role.

Roles.table_description: The table manages roles and their descriptions within the system.

columns.user_id: The unique identifier for each user.
columns.role_code: The identifier linking the user to their role.
columns.user_name: The full name of the user.
columns.user_login: The login status indicator of the user.
columns.password: The encrypted password for user authentication.

Users.table_description: The table manages user accounts and their associated roles.

columns.parent_document_structure_code: The identifier for the parent document structure.
columns.document_structure_code: The unique identifier for each document structure.
columns.document_structure_description: The description of the document structure's purpose.

Document_Structures.table_description: The table manages document structures and their hierarchical relationships.

columns.functional_area_code: The unique identifier for each functional area.
columns.parent_functional_area_code: The identifier for the parent functional area.
columns.functional_area_description: The description of the purpose of the functional area.

Functional_Areas.table_description: The table manages functional areas and their hierarchical relationships.

columns.image_id: The unique identifier for each image.
columns.image_alt_text: The textual description for the image to aid accessibility.
columns.image_name: The name or title of the image.
columns.image_url: The web address where the image is located.

Images.table_description: The table manages images and their associated attributes.

columns.document_code: The unique identifier for each document associated with a functional area.
columns.functional_area_code: The unique identifier for the functional area linked to the document.

Document_Functional_Areas.table_description: The table links documents to their respective functional areas.

columns.section_id: The unique identifier for each section within a document.
columns.document_code: The identifier linking the section to its corresponding document.
columns.section_sequence: The order in which the section appears within the document.
columns.section_code: The unique identifier for each section code.
columns.section_title: The title or heading of the section.

Document_Sections.table_description: The table manages sections of documents and their associated attributes.

columns.section_id: The unique identifier for each section of a document.
columns.image_id: The unique identifier for each image associated with a section.

Document_Sections_Images.table_description: The table links images to specific sections within documents.
